text.section: The Secretary may assess a civil penalty against any financial institution and any officer, employee, agent, or director of the institution for each knowing and willful violation of this subtitle.

section.section: The civil penalty may not exceed $50 for each day the violation continues.
For purposes of this section, a separate violation occurs at each office, branch, or place of business where a violation occurs or continues.
The total civil penalty may not exceed $1,000.

text.section: In the event of the failure of any person to pay any penalty assessed under this section, a civil action for recovery of the penalty may be brought by the State against the person.
